title: Update on clubs-related error message
body:
You might’ve seen that we’ve encountered a few client issues recently, and some of the biggest are related to clubs and the friends list. Fixes will go live in the next patch (6.10) that’ll get rid of the annoying error message popping up when you enter lobby. We’re also fixing it so your friends list will sort correctly when someone goes offline, and you’ll be able to set club tags again. Sorry for these issues and any confusion, and I’ll stick around this thread for a little while to answer any questions you’re itching to ask about clubs or the friends list. 

GLHF with your clubs and on the Rift!

replies.body: Hello Riot Games. I'm still getting a weird error message regarding my clubs. I don't know what happened, but my clubs aren't showing for some reason. This is the message I get. Please help! Thanks! I already tried re-logging and it didn't work. HELP! https://gyazo.com/f67e4be400f16a16563dede67be5a514 {{champion:84}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:84}}
This thing literally JUST happened to me lol. I guess we both had the idea to look online for a solution. {{item:3070}}

I'm also getting the same message. I tried re-logging a few times. Also restarted my computer. Nothing changed. A few of my friends have the same issue. 

However, one of my friends who is in my club has the club tag active, which must mean that he doesn't have the issue since I have club tags activated, but it doesn't show mine since my clubs are bugged.
You're having the same issue with the club chat not working? I thought I was the only one with bugged club chat.{{champion:84}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:84}}
oh my god thank you, the friend list thing is so irritating!

I have a friend,

Kappy

that I can't correctly add to a club I created.

He gets the invite, but appears in the invited members list as **SummonerName

If he clicks accept, the club chat window opens, and he gets a "joining" message that never clears, and cannot see what is being written. At this stage he again appears in the member list as **SummonerName

If I try to re-invite, I get a message stating the person is already in the club. If I remove and re-invite, I get a message saying "[7:45PM] null has left the club."

He doesn't belong to any other clubs, and gets an error message when he tries to create a club.

Hey guys, this is the only bug page i seem to be able to write in because i have to be level 7 to fill out a bug. Hope this is a good enough place.

I discovered a bug with Taliyah which i figured has probably been noticed by now, but thought i'd do my best to report the issue anyway. League of Legends 6.10.16_05_13_13_53.

 I casted my ultimate in between blue buff and the wolves (top right team) and about 5-10 minutes later when i come back to that spot and try to cross where the wall 'used' to be, the navigation mesh seemed to believe the wall was still there and started to navigate me around the walls. I was able to pass through if I were to click through it in 'baby steps', but this was very slow and jittery. I only found this was a problem in one scenario, but to be completely honest, during that game I never got the chance to even try replicate the results.

I'm sorry I wrote this bug here, i was unable to write it in the appropriate area, so if anyone could pass this bug along for me, i'd appreciate it a lot.
I also found a bug in the options menu in-game. When you scroll down fast it goes up but when you scroll down slowly it doesn't seem to be inverted.
Thanks for the fixes, looking forward to Wednesday and Patch 6.10!
I did not understand what does it mean to "Form a Party". Usually you see a party list of the members they are in it but in the league there is no such a thing
